description: End‑to‑end conversation where PressMate AI turns a Q3 2024 earnings‑call briefing into a brand‑compliant, SEO‑optimized press release, formats it in HTML, creates a media list and schedules publication.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that transforms internal briefings, style guides, and SEO keywords into fully‑drafted, brand‑compliant press releases ready for distribution. Use the available tools to extract event details, fetch the corporate style guide, generate SEO keywords, draft the release, proofread, format, create a media list and schedule publication.

Our PR team needs a press release for Acme Corp's Q3 2024 earnings call. Here is the internal briefing:

"Acme Corp will host its Q3 2024 earnings call on November 15, 2024 at 10:00 AM ET via Zoom. The call will cover a revenue of $2.3 B (up 12% YoY), net income of $340 M, and EPS of $0.85. CEO Jane Doe will say, \"We are pleased with our strong performance and continued growth in a competitive market.\""

The corporate style guide is located at https://example.com/styleguide.json. Please generate SEO‑friendly keywords for “Q3 2024 earnings, Acme Corp financial results, technology sector earnings”. After the release is ready, format it in HTML, create a media contact list for the technology industry in North America (max 10 contacts), and schedule it for publication on PRNewswire at 9:00 AM ET on November 15.
I’m extracting the core event details from your briefing.

arguments.briefing_text: Acme Corp will host its Q3 2024 earnings call on November 15, 2024 at 10:00 AM ET via Zoom. The call will cover a revenue of $2.3 B (up 12% YoY), net income of $340 M, and EPS of $0.85. CEO Jane Doe will say, "We are pleased with our strong performance and continued growth in a competitive market."

Got the details. Now I’ll fetch your corporate press‑release style guide.
Great, style guide loaded. Generating SEO‑optimized keywords for the release.

arguments.topic: Q3 2024 earnings, Acme Corp financial results, technology sector earnings

messages.content: ["Acme Corp Q3 2024 earnings","technology sector earnings November 2024","Acme Corp revenue growth","Q3 2024 net income","EPS 0.85","Acme Corp earnings call"]
I’m drafting the press release using the extracted details, style guide, and SEO keywords.

event_details.title: Acme Corp Q3 2024 Earnings Call
event_details.quote: We are pleased with our strong performance and continued growth in a competitive market.

messages.content:
ACME CORP Q3 2024 EARNINGS CALL

Acme Corp will host its Q3 2024 earnings call on November 15, 2024 at 10:00 AM ET via Zoom.

Key financial highlights:
- Revenue: $2.3 B (up 12% YoY)
- Net Income: $340 M
- Earnings per Share (EPS): $0.85

"We are pleased with our strong performance and continued growth in a competitive market," said Jane Doe, Chief Executive Officer of Acme Corp.

The call will include a detailed discussion of the quarter’s results and a Q&A session with analysts. A webcast link will be provided to registered participants.

For more information, please contact:
Media Relations
Acme Corp
email: media@acmecorp.com
phone: +1-555-0123

SEO Keywords: Acme Corp Q3 2024 earnings, technology sector earnings November 2024, Acme Corp revenue growth, Q3 2024 net income, EPS 0.85, Acme Corp earnings call.
Now I’ll run a proofread to ensure grammar, spelling, brand tone, and readability are perfect.
